Package org.onehippo.forge.repository.connector.remoting.davex

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HippoJcrRepository
    Merged interface from javax.jcr.Repository and org.hippoecm.repository.HippoRepository for convenience.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DavExHippoRepository
    HippoRepository Implementation connecting the remote repository via Jackrabbit DavEx protocol.
    DavExHippoRepositoryBasedHippoJcrRepositoryFactory
    JNDI Resource Factory to create JCR Repository by instantiating DavExHippoRepository JNDI Resource can be configured in the application context descriptor like the following for Tomcat:
    LazyHippoJcrRepository
    JCR Repository implementation wrapping HippoRepository.
